{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=EAP225 |revision=v3.x |series=AC1350 |asin=B0781YXFBT |fcc_date=11/15/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Proware |manuf_model=PW-AC235D |manuf_rev=v1.1 |type=access point |fcc_id=TE7EAP225V3 |ic_id=8853A-EAP225 |pwr_v=24 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=PoE |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A, PK712OLH, 1712, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed=750 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M14D1G1664A-2.5B |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A, PK712OLH, 1712, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9886;Q, QCA9886, 0VV, NE711SGB, E071104; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8033;AR8033-AL1A; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX, |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |pcb_id=1704262235-1.1 }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''450''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) ~ '''''1350 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1350 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Ceiling Mount Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/cat-4908_EAP225-V3.html}} {{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=EAP225_V3}} "1704262'''235'''-1.1 Rev1.0sp1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{see also|TP-LINK EAP225 v1.x|TP-LINK EAP245 v1.x|Proware}} Web GUI: http://tplinkeap.net *Wireless: 2.4GHz: 450Mbps, 5GHz: 867Mbps (AC1350) *Internal Antennas: 2.4GHz: 3x 4dBi, 5GHz: 2x 5dBi *Ethernet Port: 1x 10/100/1000 (Gigabit) port (GbE) *Power Supply: 802.3af PoE/Passive PoE (24V/0.6A) ===Reviews=== * [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33201-tp-link-eap225v3-ac1350-wireless-mu-mimo-gigabit-ceiling-mount-access-point-reviewed ''TP-Link EAP225v3 AC1350 Wireless MU-MIMO Gigabit Ceiling Mount Access Point Reviewed'' on '''SNB'''] ===See also=== :[http://www.tp-link.com/us/business-networking/wireless/ceiling-mount-access-points Ceiling Mount Access Points] *[[TP-LINK EAP110-Outdoor v1.x]] - N300 ([[QCA]]) *[[TP-LINK EAP110 v1.x]] - N300 ([[QCA]]) *[[TP-LINK EAP110 v4.x]] - N300 ([[QCA]]) *[[TP-LINK EAP115 v1.x]] - N300 ([[QCA]]) *[[TP-LINK EAP120 v1.x]] - N300 *[[TP-LINK EAP220 v1.x]] - N600 *[[TP-LINK EAP225-Outdoor]] - AC1200 ([[QCA]]) *[[TP-LINK EAP225 v1.x]] - AC1200 ([[QCA]]) *[[TP-LINK EAP225 v3.x]] - AC1350 ([[QCA]]) *[[TP-LINK EAP245 v1.x]] - AC1750 ([[QCA]]) *[[TP-LINK EAP320 v1.x]] - AC1200 ([[BCM]]) *[[TP-LINK EAP330 v1.x]] - AC1900 ([[BCM]]) __NOTOC__
